import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { changeBG() { var element = document.getElementById("header")!; element.classList.toggle("bg-image-1"); } }
